channel.title: Lexical analysis on FOL
channel.description: Recent content in Lexical analysis on FOL

item.title: Keywords
item.description: Input format FOL’s input is interpreted as a sequence of Unicode code points encoded in UTF-8 Keywords Fol has a number of restricted groups of keywords: AI (assignment indentifiers) AI_USE: use AI_DEF: def AI_VAR: var AI_FUN: fun AI_PRO: pro AI_TYP: typ TI (type indentifiers) TI_INT: int TI_FLT: flt TI_CHR: chr TI_BOL: bol TI_ARR: arr TI_SEQ: seq TI_VEC: vec TI_SET: set TI_MAP: map TI_MAT: mat TI_STR: str TI_NUM: num TI_OPT: opt

item.title: Identifiers
item.description: Identifiers in FOL can be any string of letters, digits and underscores, but beginning with a letter. Two immediate following underscores __ are not allowed. IDENTIFIER: [a-z A-Z] [a-z A-Z 0-9 _]* | _ [a-z A-Z 0-9 _]+
